recommendations: Doug Standley
CEO niolabs, Societal Innovation Holdings, Inc.
September 28, 2013, Doug worked with David in the same group

Doug is one of the most passionate, persuasive innovators I've ever met.  He is especially skilled at delivering on his ideas.  He is quick to the core of issues and can see clearly how to implement ideas, recognizing both drivers and inhibitors.  I would eagerly seek his advice on any critical issue.Intellectually, there are few who match his insight and wisdom.  For such a talented and accomplished person, he is easy to approach and remains humble--a truly rare quality.I unequivocally recommend him to anyone who wishes to engage with him.

summary: Dedicated to assisting firms to manage and profit from the complexities and changes of modern markets and technologies. Aid companies and non-profit organizations plan and execute transformation of their IT systems.Building Supply Chain Analytics(TM), an innovative startup combining (a) forklift parts and service distribution and (b) predictive maintenance and asset replacement analytics.Another on-going activity is advising and writing on global technology strategy and innovation for a major global ( G100) consumer product entity.  Clouds and Big Data (e.g., IoT, Predictive Analytics).  Examples of New Global Enterprises acting on a global level.A subsidiary activity is creating a social network coop of film makers so that I and others can communicate effectively through high quality video content.  This is an example of a New Global Enterprise operating at a local level.Specialties: Areas of experience cover Equity Trading, Sales and Research, Public Finance, Money Markets Trading, Investment Banking, Banking Credit Systems, Insurance, Portfolio Management, Market Quote Distribution and Statements for Mutual Funds, Brokerage and Credit Unions.  Additionally, have done extensive work in Health Care Systems
